EmailTemplate.subject: Tell us about your experience with NCR
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}} You are a valued customer of NCR Vision Solution. Today we would like to ask you to participate in a survey to tell us how NCR impacts your business and where we can improve our offers to better serve your needs. We want to deliver the best customer experience possible; therefore, your feedback is tremendously important to us. Time is one of the most valuable assets, and I truly appreciate you taking a few minutes of your time to to know how we can make your life easier. Please look for the email from NCR Product Team and thank you for your time and your continued partnership with NCR.
